Name: Tsukidashikun
Notes: A large stone block obstacle that periodically moves back and forth on a path.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: The rate at which it moves on the path. Default is 10.

Obj_arg1.Name: Wait Time
Obj_arg1.Description: The time in frames it waits before it moves again. Default is 120.

SW_APPEAR.Description: Appears when this switch is activated.

SW_B.Description: If used, the object won't move until this switch gets activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: Can take part in a cutscene.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
